content:
Each year in spring, I collect a certain kind of flower petal.
It's small and pink,
and when brewed in black tea, the fragrance it produces is quite something.
Hmph.

The breeze is gentle, the sunlight warm,
The buds are fresh, the flowers fair,
Yes, I'm feeling spring in the air.
Summer is the perfect season for slushies, rainbow ice cream, and lemonade. *Yee~* Now where did I put that takeout menu?

So during those spring days,
I would lean against the library's huge windows,
watching everyone running around outside.

I've been thinking about something lately.
Don't laugh when you hear this, I'm being serious.
Well...

Sometimes I can't help but wonder,
perhaps it wasn't just a dream after all, {PetPhrase}.

When I was little, I had a weak immune system.
The pollen floating everywhere in spring
would always make me feel unwell.
[Summer Chat Topic 5]
[IP Placeholder]

One third of my time is spent practicing martial arts,
One third of my time is spent working part-time jobs,
And one third of my time is spent eating...
[IP Placeholder]
*Hmph.*
Hehehe~ There's an ancient Eastern Astralink where they used to measure time based on the seasons of growth and nature.\nIn our current calendar, this would be what they called their "Spring".

Spring isn't always warm,
As neighbors in the alleyways say,
"A late spring chill."

The warmth that catches you off guard,
When suddenly faced with cold,
Perhaps, leaves the deepest impressions.
[IP Placeholder]

If ducks know about it, do geese know too?
What about wild geese? And seagulls?
I just can't figure it out—

Spring is the season when flower petals get stuck in your hair
while you run around everywhere.
[Winter Chat Topic 2]
[Winter Chat Topic 3]
[Winter Chat Topic 5]

Did you know that summer is also known as "the flourishing season"?
This is the time of year when flora flourishes and fruits ripen.
But all I can think about is lemon soda and orange slushies...
[IP Placeholder]

If that's their spring, what's their winter like?
But later I discovered
that their winter is actually quite warm — The universe is truly full of wonders.

Each year in spring, I collect a certain kind of flower petal.
It's small and pink,
and when brewed in black tea, the fragrance it produces is quite something.
[IP Placeholder]

I thought it was cold medicine.
I went around to all the pharmacies looking for it, but couldn't find any.
In the end, I just recommended our family's traditional cold remedy tea instead.

When the warm season arrives,
The balloons in the park float even higher.
What's that called again... the "hot air balloon principle"?

Do you have "spring" in your language?
I had a classmate who would get hay fever when spring came around.
He'd always talk about "spring" with a runny nose.
[IP Placeholder]
[IP Placeholder]
[IP Placeholder]

Spring has arrived, the ice and snow are melting,
Everyone's poking their heads out—
And by everyone, I mean the rocks on the mountain.

The grey of mud and emerald of lotus leaves,
The pink that gradually stains the petals,
Even memories are painted in colors.

Summer is the perfect season for slushies, rainbow ice cream,
and lemonade,
Now where did I put that takeout menu?

Not all springs are warm.
The feeling of slowly awakening from the cold
is an experience that spring can call its own.
[IP Placeholder]

When I see the peach blossoms bloom, I know it's spring,
Nothing particularly special about that.
Just another year beginning.

On a stormy spring day in their world,
at a time they'd describe as "when hibernating creatures stir,"
that's when the sowing begins, letting all things grow in joyful abundance.

<color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>
Everything is so lush and green now!
<size=64>Beautiful!</size>

The last season of the year has crept up on us.
The air is cold and crisp,
and maybe we'll be able to make snowballs before long.

You know what? I have a special connection with snow—
I always dream
of standing in a world blanketed by falling snow.
It's these small yet beautiful things that spur me on to stand up against the pressures of life. It's quite mysterious~.

As supernatural cases have become fewer,
it seems they too follow seasonal patterns,
waning as nature springs back to life.

You know what, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>?
I feel like I have a special connection with snow—
I often dream about being stood amidst heavy snowfall.

Once, during a research expedition,
I passed through a bubble world that was completely covered in ice and snow,
and the inhabitants told me that was their spring!
[IP Placeholder]

Grandma would always wear her lotus flower apron in summer~
Mmm... suddenly feeling a bit homesick.
【Heh.】
*Hmph.*

<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
Need some advice on your spring outfits?
[Summer Chat Topic 3]

Every winter,
my head goes all crackly and poppy,
it's something called static electricity, I think.

You know, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
whenever midsummer comes around,
I always dream about spending the whole day cooling off in the sea.

Just thinking about it makes me feel all cozy inside.
Well, guess I'll go to the library today!
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, would you like to join me?
[IP Placeholder]
Wait a second—when am I supposed to sleep?!

If I remain standing amidst the relentless snowfall,
I wonder... would I eventually be covered in snow,
and turn into a kind of snow-white sculpture?

So in spring, I would lie down before the huge windows of the library,
watching everyone running around outside.

The early bird catches the worm, and spring sets the tone for the year.
Time to make this year's martial arts training schedule!
(counting on fingers) One plus one, two plus six...

When I feel trapped in time's cage, unable to break free,
I remember springs like this one, after dawn breaks.
No matter how long winter lasts, spring always follows.

I've heard some clients say,
"I love spring",
...{短暂停}Oh, I didn't quite understand it back then, that's why I remember.
【IP Placeholder】
[Summer Chat Topic 1]
[Winter Chat Topic 1]

Recently, I heard Mobai reminding everyone
about spring precautions,
but I don't really pay attention to seasons.

When spring comes,
my ears start to feel ticklish,
as if someone just whispered a gentle breath beside them.

Of course, I never act on those dreams.
Untangling a wet tail is quite an undertaking.
[IP Placeholder]

But wait, there's more!
I've never had cold medicine or caught a cold
while living on <color=#97c344>{homestar} Street</color>.

Summer is when plants grow most vigorously,
It's my favorite season for making plant specimens,
This time of year captures flowers and herbs in their most beautiful state.

I just haven't figured out what to say yet.
This topic... let me think it through.
We'll talk about it next time.

Just thinking about it makes me feel all cozy inside.
Well, guess I'll go to the library today!
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, would you like to join me?

But—I only found out later!
"Spring" was actually what they called the season in his hometown,
And more importantly, <size=64>he wasn't even sick!</size>

Some write spring into their poems,
Some plant spring in their fields,
I will keep spring between the pages of my books.
[IP Placeholder]
[Summer Chat Topic 4]
[IP placeholder]

Once during my research travels,
I passed through a bubble world that was completely frozen over,
and they told me that was their spring?!

<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, you are looking radiant!
Are you using some secret skincare product or is it just the effect of the summer sun?
How mysterious indeed~.
One is rising, while the other hasn't set yet.
[IP Placeholder]
Mobai says spring is the season for fresh, delicious vegetables. But tell me, which season is all about meat?

If I remain standing amidst the relentless snowfall,
I wonder... would I eventually be covered in snow,
and turn into a snow-white sculpture?

Not every spring brings warmth,
But that feeling of gradually thawing from the cold,
That's what makes spring truly special.

But even through the glass,
the warmth of sunlight, the scent of flowers, and the sound of friends' laughter
all still reach my heart.

After consulting with Mobai,
I decided to buy a metal shoelace,
[Winter Chat Topic 4]

You're looking radiant today!
Is it some new sunscreen, or just the summer sun working its magic?
Or perhaps... you're using some secret skincare product?
[IP Placeholder]
<color=#695c3a>When did we reach Bond Lv. 4?</color>
The temperature is quietly rising each day and the chirping calls of the insects in the grass start to sound. That's right, summer is here!{开心}

Did you know that summer is also known as "the flourishing season"?
This is the time of year when flora flourishes and fruits ripen.
But all I can think about is lemon soda and orange slushies...
[IP Placeholder]

What's the best thing about winter?
It's the snow!
Nature's own toy - can't miss out on that!

The gentle spring breeze just caressed my cheeks,
And suddenly I'm in the mood to fly a kite.
[Winter Bond Lv. 34]

When I was little, I had a weak immune system.
The pollen floating around in spring
would always make me feel unwell.

Yet even from behind the glass of the windows,
the warmth of the spring sun, the fragrance of flowers in the air, and the laughter of my friends
allowed me to experience the beauty of spring all the same.

Since moving here,
This climate where cold melts away by nature's rules,
Indeed, deserves to be "liked."

When someone asks me
"Would you like ice in your sparkling water?"
I can instantly reply with
"You bet I do~"!

If you ask me
when I make decisions the fastest,
it's definitely summer~
Looks like <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color> really is a feng shui hotspot!

The last season of the year has crept up on us.
The air is cold and crisp,
and maybe we'll be able to make snowballs before long.
[IP Placeholder]

There's a Chinese poem that says, "Ducks are the first to know when spring warms the river."
Why is it that ducks are the first to notice when the river water gets warmer in spring?

<size=30>Come to think of it though...
Is my family's traditional cold remedy tea recipe
actually effective or not?</size>
[Summer Chat Topic 2]

Of course, I never act on those dreams.
Untangling a wet tail is quite an undertaking.
[IP Placeholder]
【Heh.】

In their culture, the cold season can become cozy and warm
through foot bathing.
They call this "chasing away the winter chill."

I can add so many new specimens to my leaf collection,
There are lots of new varieties here,
How lovely~.

Sometimes I can't help but wonder,
perhaps it's not just a dream,
there's a hint of mystery~.

When midsummer's heat is at its peak,
I dream of spending all day cooling off in the sea.

My dear wanderer, would you join me for a stroll in this dazzling spring?
While we walk through the gardens, I could treat you to
a clown's special rendition of the turtledove's spring song.
Heh.
Hmph.

During this season,
it's time to put on light and pretty spring clothes,
and do something seasonal, like having a picnic.

Whenever winter comes around,
I can't help but wonder,
{PetPhrase}~
The temperature is quietly rising each day and the chirping calls of the insects in the grass start to sound. That's right, summer is here!{开心}
[IP Placeholder]

The only downside is
that this "oil" can't be extracted for cooking.
[IP Placeholder]

Mobai says,
"This shoelace must stay untied,
because it follows the principle of 'grounding discharge.'"
[Winter Bond Lv. 34]

If that's their spring, what's their winter like?
But later I discovered
that their winter is actually quite warm — The universe is truly full of wonders.
<color=#695c3a>When did we reach Bond Lv. 4?</color>

Whenever winter comes around,
I can't help but think
that there's a touch of mystery in the air~.

Spring is warm and damp,
making it so easy to catch a cold.
Back home, Mommy would definitely
make me drink three big bowls of that black, bitter cold medicine every day.
Heh.

<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>Look,
Spring has arrived, and new buds are sprouting on our trees.
Can you tell the difference between new leaves and old ones?
[IP Placeholder]
[IP Placeholder]

It's these small yet beautiful things
that keep me going,
pushing back against life's many obstacles, oh so mysterious~

I always feel sad when I lose hair,
Except in summer,
Because shoulder-length hair is way too warm then.
